cancel_subscription_confirm_description: You can continue using the service until the end of your current billing period ({{date}}). After that, you will be switched to the free plan.

default_card_set_description: Default payment card has been changed.

delete_card_description: Are you sure you want to delete this payment card? Please cancel any active subscriptions using this card first.
free_tier_reset_info: Free tier usage resets on the 1st of every month. (Next reset: {{date}})
login_required_for_payment: You need to log in to make a payment.
